content: It's something that we're purpose-built to address and are in the process of aligning our strategies now to approach the SAN market, which we believe is going to yield considerable results going forward as a result of the downturn in e-commerce, fax's adjustment in terms of capital expenditure, expenses related to sales, which will allow PeriShip as an outsourced third-party relationship to attract those customers, to engage those customers at a cost much less than FedEx themselves can do so.
